about.title: About Me
about.content1: I'm Goktug Fevzi Ozcelik, 24 years old. I am a student at Erciyes University, studying Computer Engineering. Throughout my academic journey, I have had the opportunity to be involved in various projects in the fields of artificial intelligence, web programming, mobile programming, and game programming.
about.content2: Currently, I am capable of designing websites, writing backend code, and working with databases. Additionally, I develop applications for the Google Play Store.
about.content3: I had the chance to intern at Iotech, where I completed tasks related to .Net and React. In the upcoming months, as part of the Erasmus+ Internship program, I will be interning at Rulmenti S.A company in Romania. Following that, I will complete my mandatory internship at Turkish Aerospace Industries, Inc. and graduate from my department.
